comments.author: alexandair
comments.body:
> There is a symlink created from `/usr/bin/powershell` to `/opt/microsoft/powershell/powershell` to ensure `powershell` is in your path.

Is path `/opt/microsoft/powershell/powershell` correct?

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
@alexandair Yes the symlink is correct

```
raghus@raghus-Ubuntu:/usr/bin$ ls -la /usr/bin/powershell 
0 lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 36 Jul 26 16:21 /usr/bin/powershell -> /opt/microsoft/powershell/powershell




```
